checkbox: Change the status of your task
explanation: Wails Todoapp is a simple task manager so you don't forget anything
incorrect_text: You have entered less than 3 characters
alert_title_delete: Do you want to perform this action?
alert_text_delete: Are you sure you want to delete the task with ID
erasing_text: Are you sure you want to delete all your data? If you haven't exported it, you will lose it irreversibly.
data_export_text: The data has been exported successfully!
import_text: This action will overwrite the previous data.
